My current weekly column in the Phoenix Business Journal is, "Leadership Lesson: Upon reading (and hearing) the fine print."

Tom Zender: Professional CEO Mentor, Business Executive, Bestselling Author, Motivating Speaker

Professional CEO Mentor and Business Coach, Successful Business Executive, Bestselling Business Author, Motivating Business Speaker.Background:Held leadership roles with GE and Honeywell; CEO and Senior VP of Fortune 500 NYSE and NASDAQ listed corporations. midsize, small, and startup companies.CEO of Unity, a global nonprofit serving over two million members.Board member of NASDAQ and Toronto Stock exchange listed companies. Nonprofit board positions included Forum for Corporate Directors and Ottawa University.Faculty and Student Mentor at Arizona State University, advisory board member at Paradise Valley Community College.Weekly columnist about leadership for the Phoenix Business Journal. Published author of bestselling books about leadership and other business topics. Website: www.tomzender.com
Los Angeles, Toronto, New York, Kansas City Area
Board member of NASDAQ, Toronto Stock Exchange, and OTC listed corporations; board member of nonprofit Forum for Corporate Directors, Ottawa University, Evolutionary Leaders.
Nonprofit organization with 500 employees serving over two million people worldwide.
Orange County CA, Ft Lauderdale, Chicago, Cleveland, Minneapolis, Kansas City

September 7, 2016, Mitchell was a client of Tom’s

Tom Zender and I met at Eliances in Phoenix. I like the way Tom spoke and carried himself. After watching and getting to know Tom for about six months, I hired him as my CEO mentor. Tom accepted, studied our business and industry and has since given wonderful advice and coaching as both a mentor and a trusted advisor. I strongly recommend Tom Zender to any new business owner who wants the vision of someone who has been there and been successful.

Chad Dennis is a consumate entrepreneur at an early age. I mentored him and his unique startup, AddMe, while he was a student at Arizona State University. He is highly creative, has excellent business sense, and reaches out for advice and help continuously - ergo, he is coachable. AddMe has drawn the interest of users and investors alike. I expect Chad and AddMe (and future ventures) to be successful. He is a valuable addition to the entrepreneurial ecosystem. - Tom Zender: CEO Mentor

August 23, 2016, Mitchell was a client of Tom’s

Mitch Yow is a consummate entrepreneur. He has demonstrated expertise in the new Electric Vehicle (EV) technologies and markets. He is an expert in the design and application of torque converters, transmissions, and gear boxes for contemporary EV applications. Mitch's experience is drawn from years of transmission development and marketing throughout the entire automotive industry. I have been a mentor and advisor to Mitch for nearly a year. His technical expertise, market focus, management of people and projects, and interpersonal communications style are all just plain excellent. Most of all, his persistence and determination are extraordinary. I am happy to recommend Mitch Yow and his advanced thinking in a new, exciting, and exploding sustainable market.
